PATIENT_ID: TEST_AKI_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-16 06:00:00
Assessment: Patient developed acute kidney injury during hospitalization.
AKI stage 3 diagnosed on hospital day 2.
Creatinine rose to 4.8, greater than 3x baseline.
Initiation of hemodialysis planned.

[LAB] 2026-01-16 05:30:00
Creatinine: 4.8 mg/dL (baseline 1.2)
BUN: 62 mg/dL

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-16 14:00:00
Renal replacement therapy initiated today.
Started on continuous veno-venous hemofiltration.
Oliguria noted with minimal urine output over past 12 hours.
